Type IMethodCallOccurance

Namespace Machine.Fakes

Interface for detail configuration used by WasToldTo<TFake>.

Methods

  • OnlyOnce
  • Times
  • Twice

Public instance methods

void OnlyOnce()

Specifies that the behavior on the fake should only be executed once.

void Times(int numberOfTimesTheMethodShouldHaveBeenCalled)

Specifies that the behavior on the fake should be executed several times. numberOfTimesTheMethodShouldHaveBeenCalled specifies exactly how often.
Parameters
int numberOfTimesTheMethodShouldHaveBeenCalled

The number of times the behavior should have been executed.

void Twice()

Specifies that the behavior on the fake should be called twice.

Based on v0.2.0.6 of Machine.Fakes
